entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 13 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18 except minus 13 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9 except minus 5 south of Hare Bay. POP 60%
